episodes.title: Episode #2.1
episodes.plot: Amid sweeping changes at the BSU, Holden deals with severe repercussions from his close encounter with Ed Kemper.

episodes.title: Episode #2.2
episodes.plot: To glean insight into the elusive BTK killer, Bill and Holden interview Son of Sam, who makes a startling admission.

episodes.title: Episode #2.3
episodes.plot: Bill gets drawn into a horrifying crime that hits close to home. Holden receives an intriguing offer while in Atlanta to interview a pair of killers.

episodes.title: Episode #2.4
episodes.plot: Holden develops a controversial profile in the Atlanta slayings. Wendy conducts her first interview and finds being on the front lines suits her well.

episodes.title: Episode #2.5
episodes.plot: Bill's devastating family situation spills over during his interview with Holden's holy-grail subject: Charlie Manson. Wendy's new romance heats up.

episodes.title: Episode #2.6
episodes.plot: The FBI officially sends the BSU to Atlanta to investigate the missing and murdered children. Wendy second-guesses her interview methods.

episodes.title: Episode #2.7
episodes.plot: Hitting a dead end, Holden suggests a bold plan to draw the killer out. Bill's family faces more scrutiny. Wendy chafes as her job begins to shift.

episodes.title: Episode #2.8
episodes.plot: Red tape hinders Holden's plan to narrow his suspect pool. A weary and heartsick Bill tries to connect with his son. Wendy rethinks her relationship.

episodes.title: Episode #2.9
episodes.plot: The investigation zeroes in on a prime suspect who proves adept at manipulating a volatile situation to his advantage.
